name: ExchangeSsoToken
description:
Exchange OAuth code for an OIDC token to authenticate users.

Call this tool to exchange an OAuth authorization code for an OIDC token during the SSO process. This helps authenticate users in Vercel without persisting the token. Refer to the Vercel SSO documentation for more details.

parameters.name: authorization_code
parameters.description: The sensitive OAuth authorization code received from Vercel for the SSO token exchange process.

value_schema.description: The sensitive code received from Vercel

parameters.name: integration_client_id
parameters.description: The unique client ID for the integration, required for authentication.

parameters.name: integration_client_secret
parameters.description: The secret key for the integration client, used for authentication.

parameters.name: authorization_state
parameters.description: The state received from the initialization request for security validation.

value_schema.description: The state received from the initialization request

parameters.name: integration_redirect_uri
parameters.description: The URL where the user will be redirected after authentication.

parameters.name: sso_grant_type
parameters.description: Specifies the grant type as 'authorization_code' for OAuth process.

value_schema.description: The grant type, when using x-www-form-urlencoded content type
